alert.note: Alert for St. Francis (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 4:25PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. Francis County through 500 PM CDT... At 425 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Widener, or near Madison, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Madison, Widener and Round Pond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
